title: recipes_Bologna_Salad_Sandwich_Spread
text:
Title: Bologna Salad Sandwich Spread.
.
Description: This bologna salad recipe dates back to the 1950s. It's a vintage treat made with hard-boiled eggs and relish, and it appeals to folks of all ages!.
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 (16 ounce) package bologna.
- 4 large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and chopped.
- 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®), or to taste.
- 0.5 cup sweet pickle relish, or to taste.
.
Instructions:.
- Grind bologna and eggs in a meat grinder with a medium blade..
- Transfer ground mixture to a large bowl; stir in salad dressing and relish until well combined. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, 2 to 3 hours..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 166 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 7 g.
cholesterolContent: 29 mg.
fiberContent: 0 g.
proteinContent: 6 g.
saturatedFatContent: 3 g.
sodiumContent: 692 mg.
fatContent: 13 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 12 servings.
